text: Henryk Franciszek Hoser (27 November 1942 â€“ 13 August 2021) was a Polish prelate of the Catholic Church. He was bishop of Roman Catholic Diocese of Warszawa-Praga in Poland from 2008 to 2017. He was born in Warsaw. Hoser died on 13 August 2021 in Warsaw, aged 78. ==References== Category:1942 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Polish Roman Catholic bishops Category:People from Warsaw
title: Henryk Hoser
